title: Andrzej Duda
added: In May 2019, Duda visited [[Azerbaijan]]. He said that "gas and oil alike will flow... from Azerbaijan also to Poland. They will flow via Azerbaijan where the transportation corridors that are currently under construction constitute and will constitute the elements" of [[China]]â€™s [[Belt and Road Initiative]].<ref>{{cite news |title=I hope gas and oil will flow from Azerbaijan to Poland: President Duda |url=https://polandin.com/42899719/i-hope-gas-and-oil-will-flow-from-azerbaijan-to-poland-president-duda |work=Poland In |date=1 June 2019}}</ref>

In October 2020, Duda expressed deep concern over the [[2020 Nagorno-Karabakh conflict|escalation of hostilities]] between [[Azerbaijan]] and [[Armenia]] in the disputed region of [[Nagorno-Karabakh]] and called on both sides to "cease military operations and engage in dialogue".<ref>{{cite news |title=Polish president calls on Azerbaijan, Armenia to stop fighting, 'engage in dialogue' |url=https://www.polskieradio.pl/395/7785/Artykul/2598461,Polish-president-calls-on-Azerbaijan-Armenia-to-stop-fighting-engage-in-dialogue |work=[[Polskie Radio]] |date=9 October 2020}}</ref>
